data.name: Operation_Error12
data.value: Payment has been declined. Possible reasons: you ran out of fund on your account, used wrong credit card credentials, your credit card doesn't allow purchase on the Internet. Please, try to make a purchase again or call the bank of your credit card.

data.value: Payment has been declined. Please, call the Internet-bank.
